triples.name: Microbiome
triples.relevance: The paper centers on how microbiomes shape host traits and evolutionary potential.

triples.name: Quantitative genetics
triples.relevance: The paper integrates the microbiome into quantitative genetics frameworks to model host-microbiome evolution.

triples.name: Evolution
triples.relevance: The paper examines how microbiomes affect the host response to selection and host evolutionary potential.

triples.name: Population genetics
triples.relevance: The paper discusses how microbiomes shift mean phenotype and variance in host phenotypes within populations.

triples.name: Phenotype
triples.relevance: The paper analyzes how microbiomes affect host traits by shifting mean and variance in host phenotypes.

triples.name: Genetic variance
triples.relevance: The paper examines how microbiomes change the variance in host phenotype, affecting host evolutionary potential.
